original: 蜀漢官員。與張嶷、姚伷友善。隨諸葛亮征南中時，為斯都耆帥李求承所害。後張嶷懸賞李求承，捕獲罪魁禍首後，將其斬殺。
text: Shuhan officials. Friendly with Zhang Yi and Yao Ni. When Zhuge Liang enlisted in the South Middle School, he was victimized by Li Qiucheng, the senior leader of Stuart. Later Zhang Yi offered a reward to Li Qiucheng, and after capturing the culprit, he beheaded.
